title: CodeSOD: Anything and Everything
description: Today's short function comes from Janusz, and it's anything you want it to be: public static function isAnything($data) { return true; } Honestly, I'm surprised that it was made static. Sure, static is the correct choice for this function, at least if we're describing anything about this function as "correct". I'm still surprised. It's got an accurate name given its behavior, it's scoped correctly. It still shouldn't exist and I have no idea what lead to it existing, but that's not surprising. html:
by in CodeSOD on 2025-06-04 Edit

Remy Porter

Computers were a mistake, which is why I'm trying to shoot them into space. Editor-in-Chief for TDWTF.

Today's short function comes from Janusz, and it's anything you want it to be:

public static function isAnything($data)
{
    return true;
}

Honestly, I'm surprised that it was made static. Sure, static is the correct choice for this function, at least if we're describing anything about this function as "correct". I'm still surprised. It's got an accurate name given its behavior, it's scoped correctly. It still shouldn't exist and I have no idea what lead to it existing, but that's not surprising.
